name: Boxes For Meaningless Work
description: “I will have built two small boxes. I put small things in the boxes. A sign explains the boxes to anyone who should approach them. It says “Meaningless work boxes.” Throw all of the things into one box, then throw all of the things into the other.  Back and forth, back and forth. Do this for as long as you like. What do you feel? Yourself? The Box? The Things? Remember this doesn’t mean anything.”
